title: What is Bitcoin?
summary: An easy guide to understanding Bitcoin.
content: Bitcoin is a digital currency that operates without a central authority. It uses blockchain technology to enable peer-to-peer transactions securely and transparently. It's often referred to as 'digital gold'.

title: Understanding Ethereum
summary: What makes Ethereum different from Bitcoin?
content: Ethereum is a blockchain platform that allows developers to build smart contracts and decentralized applications (dApps). While Bitcoin is mainly used as digital money, Ethereum enables programmable money and logic.

title: What is XRP?
summary: XRP aims to make global payments faster and cheaper.
content: XRP is a digital currency created by Ripple Labs to facilitate fast, low-cost international money transfers. Unlike many cryptocurrencies, XRP doesn't rely on mining, making transactions efficient and eco-friendly.

title: What is BNB (Binance Coin)?
summary: BNB powers the Binance ecosystem and more.
content: BNB, originally created as a utility token for discounted trading fees on Binance, has grown into a multi-purpose token used for transaction fees, staking, and powering smart contracts on the BNB Chain.

title: What is Tether (USDT)?
summary: A stablecoin pegged to the US Dollar.
content: Tether (USDT) is a stablecoin designed to maintain a 1:1 peg with the US dollar. It's widely used in crypto trading to reduce volatility and provide a stable store of value within the cryptocurrency ecosystem.

title: What is Solana?
summary: A high-speed blockchain for decentralized apps.
content: Solana is a high-performance blockchain known for its fast transaction speeds and low fees. It supports decentralized applications (dApps) and DeFi platforms, and is often compared with Ethereum for scalability.

title: What is USD Coin (USDC)?
summary: A regulated and transparent stablecoin alternative.
content: USDC is a fully-backed stablecoin issued by regulated financial institutions and pegged 1:1 to the US dollar. It's used widely in DeFi, crypto trading, and cross-border payments.

title: What is TRON (TRX)?
summary: A blockchain platform for content sharing and smart contracts.
content: TRON is a blockchain-based operating system designed to create a decentralized internet. It enables high-throughput smart contracts and is known for hosting entertainment and content-sharing dApps.
